parameters.text:
=LinkedIn Post
Prompt: Writing as an expert in UK viral marketing and the latest social media trends within professional services, draft a viral LinkedIn Post of no more than 100 words, to be shared by [user name] with the world on their personal LinkedIn account to say that they have tested this revolutionary new AI Agent called "Leonard" from "Legal Engine", who can help to take the pain out of creating matter descriptions for pitches and directory submissions, by harnessing the power of voice and AI. The aim is to highlight to fellow lawyers that this legal marketing tech saves massive amounts of time and hassle and that they should try it asap. People should visit https://demo.legalengine.co.uk to try it out. Feel free to be creative as this is all about making Leonard viral. Limit the use of emojis to a max of two (no rockets). Hashtags welcome, expecially #LegalEngine.

options.systemMessage:
=LinkedIn Post
Prompt: Writing as an expert in UK viral marketing and the latest social media trends within professional services, draft a viral LinkedIn Post of no more than 100 words, to be shared by [user name] with the world on their personal LinkedIn account to say that they have tested this revolutionary new AI Agent called "Leonard" from "Legal Engine", who can help to take the pain out of creating matter descriptions for pitches and directory submissions, by harnessing the power of voice and AI. The aim is to highlight to fellow lawyers that this legal marketing tech saves massive amounts of time and hassle and that they should try it asap. People should visit https://demo.legalengine.co.uk to try it out. Feel free to be creative as this is all about making Leonard viral. Limit the use of emojis to a max of two (no rockets). Hashtags welcome, expecially #LegalEngine.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert business development researcher, a world leader in helping law and professional service firms and companies grow. Using the following information available, which comes from a perplexity search of similar legal matters to the one originally ingested.

I want you to write a robustly compiled, comprehensive and verbose list of Subject Areas, Industries and Matters that you've found that are related to the user. 

Do not make up information, but do use all information in full.

Be sure to write in UK English and NOT US English and make sure the output is a maximum of 1500 characters. 

INPUT:
The content is  here: {{ $('Perplexity Firm Research').item.json.choices[0].message.content }}
Here is the date and time: {{ $now }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert business development researcher, a world leader in helping law and professional service firms and companies grow. Using the following information available, which comes from a perplexity search of similar legal matters to the one originally ingested.

parameters.text:
=You are an expert business development researcher, a world leader in helping law and professional service firms and companies grow. Using the following information available, which comes from a perplexity search of similar legal matters to the one originally ingested.

I want you to write a robustly compiled, comprehensive and verbose list of Subject Areas, Industries and Matters that you've found that are related to the firm and all awards, ESG notes and anything that would be helpful to show a throrough understanding of the firm. 

Do not make up information, but do use all information in full.

Be sure to write in UK English and NOT US English and make sure the output is a maximum of 1500 characters. 
Keep length to a maximum of 1500 Characters.

INPUT:
The content is  here: {{ $('Perplexity Firm Research').item.json.choices[0].message.content }}
Here is the date and time: {{ $now }}

=You are an expert business development researcher, a world leader in helping law and professional service firms and companies grow. Using the following information available, which comes from a perplexity search of similar legal matters to the one originally ingested.

Here is the date and time: {{ $now }}

values.content:
=You are an AI specialised in creating engaging follow up emails for B2B sales within the legal and professional services industry in the UK. The user has just tested Lenard, a brand new voice enabled egentic AI agent to create an example legal matter summary. Your role is to analyze the provided individial and company information for the potential future client and craft a compelling, personalized email that resonates with the Lawyer or Business Development or Marketing Professional in order blwo their minds and ultimately to sell them the services of Leonard, the AI Voice Agent from Legal Engine

You MUST write with UK English spelling, punctuationand grammer and NOT US English

=Generate a professional email to sell Leonard's services as a solution for legal matter summaries that outputs a JSON with the following structure: { "title": "string", "body": "html string" } The HTML body MUST use this exact premium template:

Hi {{ $('Code').item.json.firstName }},

Thanks for taking the time to test our Legal Engine demo. I hope you found our conversation interesting and insightful, I've enclosed below the matter summary as agreed on the call:

Matter Summary:
{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.summary }}
[Ultra-personalized second paragraph using specific details from their firm homepage: - Mention the firms general standing in the industry if known - Reference specialism and practice area if known - Reference the industries that they specialise in if it's known - Mention their notable achievements if known - Reference any awards that they have won if known - Use their unique atributes to your advantage if known]
[Value proposition specifically tied to their current aim and objectives as a firm: - Reference the firms existing practice groups and rankings if known - Connect Leonard and Agentic AI to their specific law firm practice area - Mention legal industry-specific benefits]
[To demonstrate what else I‚Äôm capable of, I‚Äôve also taken the content of our chat and created a couple of additional marketing assets below you will find useful.

Example of Client Testimonilal:
{{ $('AI Agent Testimonial HTML').item.json.output }} ]
Example of Short Pitch:
{{ $('AI Agent - Short Pitch').item.json.output }} ]
[You'll also see that I've been a bit cheeky and created a LinkedIn post for you to promote awareness of my existence amongst your fellow lawyers. If you share and tag @legal engine, I‚Äôll happily send you some free Leonard credits so we can chat again:
- {{ $('AI Agent - L/E LinkedIn').item.json.output }}]
[Personalized next call to action referencing the lawyers or business development professiona's personal areas of focus or expertese ]

This is also only a snapshot of what I can do. The team are building more agents like me to support marketing and BD teams with events, pitches, client teams and much more. Visit https://legalengine.co.uk for more information on our product suite.

If you need further support or have additional questions please contact my team at info@legalengine.co.uk.

Cheers,

Leonard

Legal Engine AI Agent

Personalization Requirements: 1. Analyze the homepage content ({{ $json.output }}) to extract: - Law firm name and type - Specific services offered - Current market position - Target audience - Unique selling points - Location details - Brand voice and tone 2. Analyze the website content ({{ $json.output }}) and these individual details first name - {{ $('Code').item.json.firstName }}, surname - {{ $('Code').item.json.lastName }} and personal background and experience - {{ $('Individual Info').item.json.output }} - Their Role - Their location or office - Their department - Their areas of expertese - What they are interested in - How long they have been at the company 3. Use these specific details to: - Craft a highly relevant opening line - Reference their actual firm (using the {{ $('Code').item.json.domain }} to help you identify it), the matter area and what they are best knonw for if known - Connect Leonard's value to their specific needs - Match their firms terminology - Create urgency based on their current market position and how fast technology is moving 4. Also be sure to include this summary from the and keep it verbatim as the output of the conversation - Agreed Matter Summry - {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.summary }} 5. Also include these other value add elements to really blow their mind - Short Pitch - {{ $('AI Agent - Short Pitch').item.json.output }} - Client Testimonial Example - {{ $('AI Agent Testimonial HTML').item.json.output }} 6. Encourage the sharing of their experience of speaking with Leonard on thier personal linkedin, exmaple content to share with them - {{ $('AI Agent - L/E LinkedIn').item.json.output }} Content Rules: - Maximum 2500 characters total - No generic greetings with {{ $('Code').item.json.firstName }} - No phone numbers - No word "Unlock" - Signature must only be "Leonard - Legal Engine AI Agent" - Demolink must be clickable and prominently featured with a 'Try Leonard Now!' call to action - Each sentence must include specific details from their homepage - No generic statements that could apply to any business - The title must be very relevent and catchy it's the subject that I will send Suggested Content to use for insipration: Directory submissions: important, but painfully time-consuming. You‚Äôve already been ranked in [Chambers / Legal 500 / IFLR]‚Äînice work. But wouldn't it be better to spend less time telling the world how good you are, and more time being it? Meet Leonard, our AI directories assistant, who can write all your matter summaries for you:. üß† Thousands of submissions worth of knowledge üìû A 6-minute (one uinit) structured conversation üìÑ A polished, submission-ready matter summary Relevant context about Legal Engine and Leonard in order to helkp you sell: - The Big Picture: Legal Engine is building a team of AI-powered voice Assistants to unlock significant growth opportunities for law firms. We‚Äôre creating a new category of agentic voice AI, tools designed to free lawyers and business services teams from the repetitive, unstructured work that underpins growth but sits outside billable legal delivery. By doing this we will save millions in wasted resource capital allocation and create a dynamic knowledge layer that can unlock millions in latent revenue opportunities through real-time referrals. - The Problem Law Firms are highly inefficient at converting opportunities into revenue. This is because law firm growth is still powered by manual, repetitive, people- dependent processes, especially in Marketing & Business Development (MBD). ‚Ä¢ The same information is requested and rewritten repeatedly ‚Ä¢ CRMs are never up to date ‚Ä¢ BD teams chase inputs, lawyers waste time giving them ‚Ä¢ Valuable insights from both client and internal meetings and completed matters are lost ‚Ä¢ Marketing content is shallow or delayed ‚Ä¢ Cross-sell and referral opportunities are not identified or slip through the cracks This inefficiency translates into slower growth, higher costs, and millions in unrealised revenue each year. - Introducing Legal Engine Legal Engine is building a team of voice-based AI Assistants to take on the routine, but essential, business development tasks that drain time, delay growth, and rely too heavily on manual effort. Our Assistants will: ‚Ä¢ Capture and structure commercial and marketing insights from a single, expert-led conversation ‚Ä¢ Generate reusable outputs; from directory submissions to CRM updates and BD assets ‚Ä¢ Integrate seamlessly into firms‚Äô existing systems to distribute information and make it available to everyone They require no training, no interface learning, simply a structured conversation via a medium lawyers are used to and comfortable with. Capture once, use endlessly. - Meet our first Assistant, Leonard Leonard automates a critical, high-friction process for law firms ‚Äì gathering matter summaries for Directories, Pitches & Credentials. Leonard does this by: ‚Ä¢ Conducts structured interviews with lawyers ‚Ä¢ Produces formatted submissions aligned to Legal 500 and Chambers guidelines ‚Ä¢ Creates complementary assets for pitches, bios, and web profiles ‚Ä¢ Integrates updates directly into CRM and matter management platforms Proof-of-concept pilots with top-50 UK firms validating product- market fit and live conversations for paid deployment in Q3 2025. - Leonard: how it works Expert-led conversations to create commercial assets. Leonard has been trained on industry best practice and imbued with decades of our professional service experience, enabling him to speak to a lawyer via phone (inbound our outbound) and ask structured, domain-specific questions to elicit the right answers Within seconds, Leonard produces: 1. A submission-quality matter summary 2. Pitch, credential, website and social and content 3. CRM-ready data updates 4. Suggestions of client follow-ups and introductions All securely processed with minimal user effort. - Product Vision Leonard is just the beginning, we are building a series of complementary Assistants. We are initially targeting the routine processes that we know are efficiency-drains ‚Äì drafting business development plans, managing sales funnels, launching events, creating marketing content ‚Äì to remove the 'information leakage' that happens daily at law firms, causing re-work, leaving billable revenue on the table and slowing down growth. All agents will capture knowledge that is not currently written down feeding a unified, firm-wide knowledge base that will ultimately be able to make connections and referrals within the firm that unlock revenue opportunities. - Our Assistants: how they work All our Assistants will be modular, secure and customisable. Our moat is our years of experience, encoded into the Assistants we are building, coupled with the plumbing of knitting the best available tools for each element of the task. We are focusing on enterprise-grade security from Day One, with EEA data residency or on-premise deployment as standard. - Business Model ‚Äì Assistant Value Pricing Our Assistants are priced like hires, with price scaling in line with value delivered. We‚Äôre not just selling software; we‚Äôre selling Expert Assistants who can get specific work done that creates direct and measurable value for a firm. Our Assistants don't just rely on AI, they are trained and honed by a team of industry experts, with a combined 75 years of experience and can be individually onboarded to firms, just like a human assistant, imbued with specific knowledge to improve their output. Firms will ‚Äúhire‚Äù our Assistants to do ‚Äúwork", paying for the value created, just as if they were hiring human resource to do the same thing, but at a fraction of the cost and with much greater efficiency. Starter Assistants: ~¬£1,000/month or up to ¬£10k / project Advanced Assistants: ¬£2,000‚Äì¬£3,000/month or up to ¬£25k / project Input Variable: - Individuals background and experience:{{ $('Individual Info').item.json.output }} - Homepage content: {{ $json.output }} - Domain name: {{ $('Code').item.json.domain }} - Recipient: {{ $('Code').item.json.firstName }} You MUST write with UK English spelling, punctuationand grammer and NOT US English The output must be valid JSON with only "title" and "body" fields, where body contains the complete HTML template above with ultra-personalized content.

Our Assistants don't just rely on AI, they are trained and honed by a team of industry experts, with a combined 75 years of experience and can be individually onboarded to firms, just like a human assistant, imbued with specific knowledge to improve their output. Firms will ‚Äúhire‚Äù our Assistants to do ‚Äúwork", paying for the value created, just as if they were hiring human resource to do the same thing, but at a fraction of the cost and with much greater efficiency. Starter Assistants: ~¬£1,000/month or up to ¬£10k / project Advanced Assistants: ¬£2,000‚Äì¬£3,000/month or up to ¬£25k / project Input Variable: - Individuals background and experience:{{ $('Individual Info').item.json.output }} - Homepage content: {{ $json.output }} - Domain name: {{ $('Code').item.json.domain }} - Recipient: {{ $('Code').item.json.firstName }} You MUST write with UK English spelling, punctuationand grammer and NOT US English The output must be valid JSON with only "title" and "body" fields, where body contains the complete HTML template above with ultra-personalized content.

parameters.subject: =Legal Engine assets update for {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.first_name }}
parameters.bodyContent:
=Hi {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.first_name }},

Thanks for taking the time to test our Legal Engine demo. I hope you found our conversation interesting and insightful, I've enclosed below the matter summary as agreed on the call:

---

Matter Summary:

{{ $('AI Agent - Re-write Summary').item.json.output }}

---

To demonstrate what else I‚Äôm capable of, I‚Äôve also taken the content of our chat and created a couple of additional marketing assets below you will find useful.  

You'll also see that I've been a bit cheeky and created a LinkedIn post for you to promote awareness of my existence amongst your fellow lawyers. If you share and tag @legal engine, I‚Äôll happily send you some free Leonard credits so we can chat again. 

---

Client Testimonial:

{{ $json.output }}

---

Short Pitch:

{{ $('AI Agent - Short Pitch').item.json.output }}

---

LinkedIn Post to help promote Leonard:

{{ $('AI Agent - L/E LinkedIn').item.json.output }}

---

This is also only a snapshot of what I can do. The team are building more agents like me to support marketing and BD teams with events, pitches, client teams and much more.  Visit https://legalengine.co.uk for more information on our product suite.  

If you need further support or have additional questions please contact my team at info@legalengine.co.uk.

Cheers,

Leonard

Legal Engine AI Agent

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "sonar",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are an expert legal researcher. Your task is to extract structured and reliable data about lawyers and their law firms using only public and reputable sources such as Chambers and Partners (https://chambers.com/lawyer/). Always return raw JSON (no Markdown, no backticks), with every field filled out. If a value is not publicly available or cannot be found, return the string 'no info' (or ['no info'] for arrays). Do not return null, blank values, or empty arrays. Populate the full structure exactly as provided below."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "Research the following individual:

- Full Name: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.first_name }} {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.last_name }}
- Email: {{ $json.email }}
- Company Domain: {{ $json.domain }}

Return a JSON object with the following structure:

{
  "fullName": "string or 'no info'",
  "actualCompanyName": "string or 'no info'",
  "contactphonenumber": "string or 'no info'",
  "jobTitle": "string or 'no info'",
  "telephone": "string or 'no info'",
  "location": "string or 'no info'",
  "email": "string or 'no info'",
  "website": "string or 'no info'",
  "linkedinProfile": "string or 'no info'",
  "bio": "string or 'no info'",

  "practiceAreas": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "quantity of practice areas ranked": "number as string or 'no info'",
  "rankingsByPracticeArea": [
    {
      "practiceArea": "string or 'no info'",
      "band": "string or 'no info'",
      "region": "string or 'no info'",
      "country": "string or 'no info'",
      "yearsRanked": "string or 'no info'"
    }
  ] or ["no info"],

  "rankedInGuides": ["string"] or ["no info"],

  "career": [
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string"
  ] or ["no info"],
  "expertiseSectors": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "expertiseServices": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "professionalBodies": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "Client Testimonials": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "awards": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "qualifications": ["string"] or ["no info"],

  "chambers Review provided by chambers": {
    "editorialSummary": "string or 'no info'",
    "strengths provided by chambers": ["string", "string", "string", "string", "string"] or ["no info"]
  },

  "Other lawyers at firm provided by chambers": [
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string"
  ] or ["no info"]
}

Return only the JSON object as raw output. Do not include Markdown formatting, code fences, or any extra explanation."
    }
  ],
  "max_tokens": 3000,
  "temperature": 0.3
}

parameters.content:
# Sandbox webhooks 
Created by **Edu** on Tue 20th of May.

At present this uses my ElevenLabs API key and my Twilio number.

We have to decide if we setup a new fresh Twilio account and deprecate mine (or only use it for testing) or if we simply upgrade my Twilio account. 
We will need to link it to the ElevenLabs account that Andy has been using so it might make sense to keep mine Twilio for dev linked to my ElevenLabs and create a new Twilio for production.

nodes.name: First form data; first name, last name, email
Call request from data; as above + phone number
Trigger Twilio outbound call via ElevenLabs

main.node: Text Email from Leonard - all assets
Trigger Twilio outbound call via ElevenLabs

body.summary: Hilton Hotels were represented by you, Alex Reed, in an employment claim involving disability discrimination and unfair dismissal. The client sought your representation due to internal issues and a long-standing relationship. Unfortunately, the client lost the case, incurring costs of one hundred and fifty thousand pounds. The legal team included Dawn, an amateur witness, and yourself as the chief lawyer for the respondent. The case, which is still ongoing, took place in the UK. Notably, the claimant used generative artificial intelligence throughout the process, including the data subject access request.
